name: Infinity Run (CouchPotatoGames)
description:
Title: Infinity Run

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:
A really simple game made for the Game Design Concepts course for The University of Tulsa

Instructions:
Right/left arrow keys: Move right/left
Up arrow: Jumps
Enter key: Reset on game over

Game Design Team:
Ayden Pingleton – Game Designer
